name: The Dragonstar Trilogy
overview: Compilation that includes: The Dragonstar Trilogy Part I The Dragonstar Trilogy Part II The Dragonstar Trilogy Part III Dragonstar is a very traditional text adventure, which the author described as "Classic Adventure", but without the interesting bits". The interface is text driven with only a handful of illustrations for some of the locations. The text parser uses simple verb/noun for commands.
